description:
Treat your peepers to crisp and bright images of birds, woodland critters, or the route ahead. With large 50mm objective lenses the Powerview® 10X50 binoculars pull in plenty of light, so you won’t miss a thing.

  • Slip resistant rubberized armor
  • Multicoated optics allow max light transmission with minimal internal glare and flare
  • 10x magnification delivers a bright image with excellent detail from edge-to-edge
  • Porro prism design provides excellent depth perception and clarity
  • Textured center-focus knob for precise adjustment
  • Fold down eyecups work with glasses
  • Includes soft carrying case, protective caps, neck strap, and lens cleaning cloth
  • Tripod mountable
name: Bushnell Powerview 10x50 Binoculars
